rules_text:
Whenever another creature dies, you may integrate it. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Whenever a creature card is integrated onto Unmolded One, you may have it become a copy of that card until end of turn, except it has Unmolded One’s abilities.
notes:
!canoncard Renegade Doppelganger
 101: Integrating is now optional.
